An elegy on the death of Sir Joseph Sheldon, late lord mayor of London.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for T. Haly, London, : in the year, 1681.
Verse: "Spight of the most capricious critticks rage ..." Within mourning borders. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
